name: Valesca Popozuda
description: '''Valesca Reis Santos''', better known as '''Valesca Popozuda''' (born October 6, 1978) is a Brazilian singer, dancer and former reality show contestant. She was the lead singer for the Brazilian [[funk carioca]] band Gaiola das Popozudas. Her [[stage name]] is [[Brazilian Portuguese]] for "Big-butted Valesca".
